text: The International Film Music Critics Association Award for Best Original Score for Television is an annual award given by the International Film Music Critics Association, or the IFMCA. The award is given to the composer of a television score deemed to be the best in a given year. It has been awards every year since 2004. ==Winners and nominations== ===2000s=== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" ! width="10%" | Year ! width="40%" | Series ! width="40%" |
